DOC.brief_summary: This research conduct determine whether risk factor exist piperacillin/tazobactam resistance ESBL organism .
DOC.brief_title: Risk Factors Piperacillin/Tazobactam Resistance Extended-Spectrum Beta-Lactamase ( ESBL ) Producing Organisms
DOC.detailed_description: This chart review UPMC . NO human subject interaction occur .
DOC.criteria: Clinical information collect chart review `` case '' `` control '' patient . A `` case A '' patient define follow : One clinical culture positive ESBL produce bacteria organism piperacillin/tazobactam resistant . A `` case B '' patient define follow : One clinical culture positive ESBL produce bacteria organism piperacillin/tazobactam susceptible . Additionally , 1 control patient hospital time case patient randomly select case either case group . Patients < 18 year age
